subject: Writing
title: The Wire Services Connect the World
description: A fast breakdown of The Wire Services Connect the World for builders.

hook.text: Before wire services, news from London took weeks to reach New York. The telegraph changed that to minutes.

buildup.text: The Associated Press, founded in 1846, pooled resources to share news across newspapers via telegraph.

discovery.text: Wire services created a new writing style: the inverted pyramid, putting key facts first.

twist.text: This style exists because telegraph lines could fail â€” the most important information had to go first.

climax.text: Wire services standardized news globally â€” the same story reached thousands of papers simultaneously.

punchline.text: Unreliable wires created journalism's most reliable format.

quiz.question: Why was the inverted pyramid writing style invented?
options: Telegraph lines could fail, so key facts went first
